answers.text:
Hi Joseph, 
I found a previously asked question on building and maintenance process improvement that includes many tips and best practices in the answer. I believe you will find this useful as you come up with your building and maintenance plans. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21293
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Joseph Beasley
text:
I am looking for any research on best practices of local governments for buildings and ground maintenance. Any research on buildings and grounds departments/divisions that maintain and manage ALL of a city's buildings and grounds?
*Particularly interested in anything North Carolina related
Thank you!
title: Buildings and Grounds Maintenance
